ai-tha-ap368:0.3_0: The Elders sitting on the Kadambī river,
ai-tha-ap368:1.1_0: “A Buddha praised the appearance of a golden palanquin,
ai-tha-ap368:1.2_0: if he is on the highway;
ai-tha-ap368:2.2_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap368:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap368:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kadambī.
ai-tha-ap368:6.1_0: he gave the sixth year to the Elder Kadambī flowers,
